title: Thoongaavanam trailer 2 released
text:
The second trailer of Kamal Haasan-starrer Tamil-Telugu bilingual 'Thoongaavanam' was released today along with the audio launch. The film, which features Trisha Krishnan and Prakash Raj in the lead, will be helmed by Kamal's long-time associate Rajesh M. Selva. Said to be a fast-paced thriller, 'Thoongaavanam' will feature Kamal Haasan in the role of a policeman, while Prakash Raj will be seen as his corrupt partner. The entire story will unfold in a single night.
The film also features Madhu Shalini, Sampath Raj, Kishore and Asha Sharath in important roles. The film is an official remake of a French thriller Nuit Blanche (Sleepless Night). The action thriller is a bilingual, and is titled Chikati Rajyam in Telugu.
